Thanks Eric,

I couldn't get jdku23, but, i did get jdku24 and i think it s=
hould be alright to use that. 
But, after using jdku24, it replaced my curr=
ent jreu23 with jreu24 and arcreader command line utility, which used to wo=
rk before this upgrade, has stopped working and started giving same error a=
s eclipse was giving. Also, is it necessary to use JDKU23 to compile these =
project files or it is ok to just run them using JREU23? I tried installing=
 jreu23 separately and tried to execute arcreader using that, but of no use=
, it gives me the same error:

C:\Users\Darshan\workspace\MyIndexer>arcread=
er IAH-20100901015110-00001-10.185.5.74-8080.arc.gz
Exception in thread "ma=
in" java.io.IOException: Resetting to invalid mark
        at java.io.Buffe=
redInputStream.reset(Unknown Source)
        at org.archive.io.GzippedInput=
Stream.<init>(GzippedInputStream.java:129)
        at org.archive.io.Gzippe=
dInputStream.<init>(GzippedInputStream.java:90)
        at org.archive.io.a=
rc.ARCReaderFactory$CompressedARCReader.<init>(ARCReaderFactory.java:350)
 =
       at org.archive.io.arc.ARCReaderFactory.getArchiveReader(ARCReaderFac=
tory.java:121)
        at org.archive.io.arc.ARCReaderFactory.get(ARCReader=
Factory.java:106)
        at org.archive.io.ArchiveReaderFactory.getArchive=
Reader(ArchiveReaderFactory.java:122)
        at org.archive.io.ArchiveRead=
erFactory.get(ArchiveReaderFactory.java:115)
        at org.archive.io.Arch=
iveReaderFactory.getArchiveReader(ArchiveReaderFactory.java:88)
        at =
org.archive.io.ArchiveReaderFactory.getArchiveReader(ArchiveReaderFactory.j=
ava:82)
        at org.archive.io.arc.ARCReaderFactory.get(ARCReaderFactory=
.java:69)
        at org.archive.io.arc.ARCReader.main(ARCReader.java:816)
=

Also on the link provided by you where it mentions such issuewith GZIP, ht=
tps://webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER-1865, seems to be for heritrix3. Does =
that make any difference in terms of reading archive files?

Let me know if=
 i'm not very clear here, I will try to explain again. Thanks in advance.

=
- Darshan Karia.

> 
> Hello,
> 
> I am wor=
king towards an indexing project for Heritrix archived
> files. As an initi=
al stage, I am trying to read gzipped archive
> files generated by heritrix=
 1.14.4.
> 
> When I try to use the command line utility provided with heri=
trix
> named arcreader.cmd, it works fine. But, I want to use ARCReader
> c=
lass in my own class to make a manageable reading process of
> multiple arc=
hive files. When I try to get ARCReader using
> ARCReaderFactory with filen=
ame and offset as argument, it seems to
> work fine, but when i do not prov=
ide any offset, it gives me
> IOException with this message:"resetting to i=
nvalid mark".
>
> [=E2=80=A6]

Hi Darshan,

Please see this issue:

https:/=
/webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER-1865

You might consider using a pre-JDK6u2=
3 version of Java.

best, Erik
